A boilerplate application for Django web applications made for a class/open-source project in Spring 2015. I worked on giAPI usage examples and methods for handling oAuth for its respective APIs. The APIs I worked are: Twitter, Instagram, Tumblr, Github and LinkedIn.

A startup project assisting on mobile and website development using Ionic and Django rest framework respectively. The web development I’ve assisted on the management site and some of its api’s endpoint. The mobile app, I’ve worked on the main features such as login, signup, newsfeed, update profile pages and etc.

Super Mario World An ACM’s Game Development group project experimenting with ImpactJS game engine to Koopa Krisis remake Super Mario World. I worked on implementing the behavior of enemy AIs, such as Fire brothers, Skeleton, and Thwomp.
Problem Database
Mainly implemented the search engine in python, also worked on the upload and download functions to the files on the database.
